entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
